title: Textile, 1750–1800
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: resist printed on plain weave
dimensions:
H x W: 72 x 52 cm (28 3/8 x 20 1/2 in.)
H x W (flower head): 18 x 20 cm (7 1/16 x 7 7/8 in.)
description: Coarse cream-colored cotton printed in one shade of blue. Design shows heavy flower heads, a serrated pointed leaf; and other smaller flowers springing on short stems from branches. Design is much enhanced by lines of white dots, particularly in outlining leaves on larger flower head.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1750–1800.Medium: cotton
Technique: resist printed on plain weave. Gift of James W. Jasper. 1957-33-1.
